# status

**Instance Property**

The completion state to look for when searching for tasks.

## Declaration

```swift
var status: INTaskStatus { get }
```

## Discussion

When the value of this property is [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INTaskStatus/unknown], don’t consider the status of a task when performing your search. For other values, include tasks in your search results only when their status matches the specified value.

## Searching for Tasks by Their Status

- **INTaskStatus**: Constants indicating the completion state of a task.
